Defensive Ball Curl

0.text: Active: Rammus  channels for up to 6 seconds to roll into a ball, gaining  25% − 39.17% (based on level) bonus total movement speed per second over the duration, up to a maximum of 150% − 235% (based on level). Powerball can be recast after 1 second within the duration, and does so automatically afterwards or when  interrupted.
0.html:
Active: Rammus channels for up to 6 seconds to roll into a ball, gaining  25% − 39.17% (based on level) bonus total movement speed per second over the duration, up to a maximum of 150% − 235% (based on level).

Powerball can be recast after 1 second within the duration, and does so automatically afterwards or when interrupted.
markedPassages: channels
25% − 39.17% (based on level) bonus total movement speed
25% − 39.17% (based on level) bonus total movement speed
interrupted

1.text: Rammus stops rolling upon colliding with an enemy, dealing magic damage to all nearby enemies and  knocking them back 125 units, though not through terrain. Enemies hit are then  stunned and  revealed for 0.4 seconds, as well as  slowed for 1 second.
1.html: Rammus stops rolling upon colliding with an enemy, dealing magic damage to all nearby enemies and knocking them back 125 units, though not through terrain. Enemies hit are then stunned and revealed for 0.4 seconds, as well as slowed for 1 second.
markedPassages: knocking them back
stunned
revealed
slowed

0.text: Active: Rammus enters a defensive stance for 6 seconds, gaining  bonus armor and  bonus magic resistance. While active, enemies that use a basic attack  on-hit against Rammus are dealt magic damage equal to  Spiked Shell's bonus damage.
0.html: Active: Rammus enters a defensive stance for 6 seconds, gaining  bonus armor and  bonus magic resistance. While active, enemies that use a basic attack on-hit against Rammus are dealt magic damage equal to Spiked Shell's bonus damage.

bonus magic resistance
on-hit
Spiked Shell's

1.text: Rammus'  basic attacks extend the remaining duration of Defensive Ball Curl by 0.4 seconds, up to a maximum of 4 additional seconds.
1.html: Rammus' basic attacks extend the remaining duration of Defensive Ball Curl by 0.4 seconds, up to a maximum of 4 additional seconds.

2.text: Defensive Ball Curl can be recast after 1 second within the duration, and does so automatically upon casting  Powerball.
2.html: Defensive Ball Curl can be recast after 1 second within the duration, and does so automatically upon casting Powerball.
markedPassages: Powerball

3.text: Recast: Rammus ends Defensive Ball Curl.

champion

1.text: The duration of the bonus attack speed continuously refreshes during  Powerball,  Defensive Ball Curl and  Soaring Slam.
1.html: The duration of the bonus attack speed continuously refreshes during Powerball, Defensive Ball Curl and Soaring Slam.
markedPassages: Powerball
Defensive Ball Curl
Soaring Slam

0.text: Active: Rammus  leaps to the target location with  immunity to crowd control. Upon arrival, he creates an impact that deals magic damage to nearby enemies and  slows them for 1.5 seconds. The impact deals increased damage at the epicenter if Soaring Slam was cast further than 800 units, capped at 1700 units with 50% increased damage.
0.html: Active: Rammus leaps to the target location with immunity to crowd control. Upon arrival, he creates an impact that deals magic damage to nearby enemies and slows them for 1.5 seconds. The impact deals increased damage at the epicenter if Soaring Slam was cast further than 800 units, capped at 1700 units with 50% increased damage.
markedPassages: leaps
immunity to crowd control
slows

1.text: If Soaring Slam was cast during  Powerball, enemies within the epicenter are also  knocked up for 0.75 seconds and are dealt  Powerball's damage.  Powerball will not collide with enemies during the dash, and its channel will be maintained for the dash and end afterwards.
1.html: If Soaring Slam was cast during Powerball, enemies within the epicenter are also knocked up for 0.75 seconds and are dealt Powerball's damage. Powerball will not collide with enemies during the dash, and its channel will be maintained for the dash and end afterwards.
markedPassages: Powerball
knocked up

2.text: The impact causes 3 aftershocks to burst from the area over 3.5 seconds, each one dealing magic damage to enemies within and applying the initial  slow, which stacks up to 4 times.
2.html: The impact causes 3 aftershocks to burst from the area over 3.5 seconds, each one dealing magic damage to enemies within and applying the initial slow, which stacks up to 4 times.
markedPassages: slow

3.text: Soaring Slam's damage affects structures and is doubled against  turrets.
3.html: Soaring Slam's damage affects structures and is doubled against turrets.
markedPassages: turrets

4.text: Soaring Slam will cast at max range if cast beyond that.

skillTabs.concerningText: If Soaring Slam was cast during  Powerball, enemies within the epicenter are also  knocked up for 0.75 seconds and are dealt  Powerball's damage.  Powerball will not collide with enemies during the dash, and its channel will be maintained for the dash and end afterwards.

If Soaring Slam was cast during  Powerball, enemies within the epicenter are also  knocked up for 0.75 seconds and are dealt  Powerball's damage.  Powerball will not collide with enemies during the dash, and its channel will be maintained for the dash and end afterwards.

textContent.text: The impact causes 3 aftershocks to burst from the area over 3.5 seconds, each one dealing magic damage to enemies within and applying the initial  slow, which stacks up to 4 times.

textContent.text: Soaring Slam's damage affects structures and is doubled against  turrets.

textContent.text: Soaring Slam will cast at max range if cast beyond that.

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+20 ability haste
+400 health
+30 armor
+30 magic resistance

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Voidborn Resilience: For each second in combat with champions, gain 2 bonus armor and bonus magic resistance for 6 seconds, stacking up to 8 times for a maximum of 16 bonus resistances. At maximum stacks, instantly deal 80 (+ 7% bonus health) magic damage to enemy champions within 700 units, heal for the same amount for each target damaged, and increase your bonus resistances by 20% until the end of combat.
Mythic Passive: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 5 armor and 5 magic resistance.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – VOIDBORN RESILIENCE: For each second in combat with champions, gain 2 bonus armor and bonus magic resistance for 6 seconds, stacking up to 8 times for a maximum of 16 bonus resistances. At maximum stacks, instantly deal 80 (+ 7% bonus health) magic damage to enemy champions within 700 units,  heal for the same amount for each target damaged, and increase your bonus resistances by 20% until the end of combat.

1.originHTML: +  +  +  800

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+500 health
+50 armor

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Immolate: Taking or dealing damage activates this passive for 3 seconds. Deal 15 (+ 1.75% bonus health) magic damage every second to enemies within 325 (+ 100% bonus size) units, with the damage being increased by 25% against minions. This executes minions that would be killed by one more tick of damage. Damaging enemy champions or epic monsters with this effect grants a stack for 5 seconds that increases subsequent Immolate damage by 10%, stacking up to 6 times for a 60% increase.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – IMMOLATE: Taking or dealing damage activates this passive for 3 seconds. Deal 15 (+ 1.75% bonus health) magic damage every second to enemies within  325 (+ 100% bonus size) units, with the damage being increased by 25% against minions. This executes minions that would be killed by one more tick of damage. Damaging enemy champions or epic monsters with this effect grants a stack for 5 seconds that increases subsequent Immolate damage by 10%, stacking up to 6 times for a 60% increase.

active.originText: UNIQUE – MONOLITH: Gain a  shield for 100 (+ 90% bonus health), decaying over 2.5 seconds, and 25% increased size while active (90 second cooldown).

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Fortify: Increase your bonus armor and bonus magic resistance by 5% for 6 seconds when a champion deals damage to you, stacks up to 5 times for a maximum of 25%. This stacks once per unique champion.

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+300 health
+45 armor
+5% movement speed

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Shipwrecker: While moving, generates 7 stacks of Momentum every 0.25 seconds, granting up to 40 bonus movement speed at 100 stacks after 3.75 seconds of moving. Momentum decays by 15 every 0.25 seconds while immobilized. Basic attacks consume all stacks to deal 0 − 40 (based on Momentum) (+ 0% − 100% (based on Momentum) base AD) bonus physical damage on-hit. At maximum stacks, the target is also slowed by 50% for 1 second.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – SHIPWRECKER: While moving, generates 7 stacks of Momentum every 0.25 seconds, granting up to 40 bonus movement speed at 100 stacks after 3.75 seconds of moving. Momentum decays by 15 every 0.25 seconds while  immobilized. Basic attacks consume all stacks to deal 0 − 40 (based on Momentum) (+ 0% − 100% (based on Momentum) base AD) bonus physical damage on-hit. At maximum stacks, the target is also  slowed by 50% for 1 second.

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Rock Solid: Every first incoming instance of post-mitigation basic damage per cast instance is reduced by 5 (+ 3.5 per 1000 maximum health), maximum 40% reduction each.
Unique – Critical Resilience: Reduces incoming critical strike damage from basic attacks by 20%.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – ROCK SOLID: Every first incoming instance of post-mitigation  basic damage per cast instance is reduced by 5 (+ 3.5 per 1000 maximum health), maximum 40% reduction each.
